publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4536 Bill Wilson: Sandy Stoddart, Freeman of Renfrewshireâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Sandy Stoddart on becoming a Freeman of Renfrewshire, the first such recognition in 48 years; recognises the international reputation that the sculptor has developed over the years while continuing to live and work in Paisley, promoting the town and Renfrewshire across the world, and considers this award, above all the others that he has earned, as an expression of appreciation and respect from the people of Renfrewshire to the world-renowned artist. Supported by: Anne McLaughlin, Bob Doris, Patricia Ferguson, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Bill Kidd, Stewart Maxwell, Ms Wendy Alexander, Annabel Goldie*
S3M-4536 Sandy Stoddart, Freeman of Renfrewshire (lodged on 29 June 2009) Stuart McMillan*
